creator: rein@basefarm.no
text:
Created attachment 29403
Patch to fix the bug

When a :port is included in the CacheKeyBaseURL the ":" is lost from the actual cache key value.  This doesn't harm apache by itself, the real problem arise if some external program which "knows" about the cache keys structure is used to modify the cache. The attached patch should fix the bug.

Rein Tollevik
Basefarm AS
